summary: One of Backsteppos best works with a little transparency.
descriptionHtml:
This now requires an XPMSE skeleton SKSE and HDT.

a photoshop corset texture resource file is included to dial in the amount of alpha transparency you so desire.
Bodyslide files have been added as well. Default is UNPB. This is based on UUNP-HDT.
Backsteppo deserves all of the credit being the creator of the original version of this outfit mod.

If you were wondering about the latest skin textures. Yep, it's mine and no it isn't published.
Isabel (the wearer) is also an unpublished follower of my creation as well as the follower in the background.

One of the best things about bodyslide is that you can mix and match outfit components spanning several mods as you can see in one of the posted images.

To be perfectly clear, everything in this mod has been collected and modified over several years. My input had nothing to do with anything other than textures and modifying existing meshes and esp. To which I ask no credit what-so-ever, as always. Â
author: Todd420

files.name: DC Sorceress UNPB HDT wbodyslide FINAL.7z
